H0.text: What kind of dish is the French ‘pithivier’. Tart

H1.text: What kind of dish is the French ‘pithivier’. Cake

H2.text: What kind of dish is the French ‘pithivier’. Quiche

H3.text: What kind of dish is the French ‘pithivier’. Pie

A4.text: A pithivier is a round, enclosed pie usually made by baking two disks of puff pastry, with a filling stuffed in between.

A5.text: The filling of the pithivier is often a sweet cream of almonds and not frangipane as in the galette des rois, but savoury pies with vegetable, meat or cheese filling can also be called pithivier.
